attributes.action: To Hang any person found guilty of Terrorism and Treason against the peoples of the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Any person found guilty of intending to implicate an act of Terrorism upon the people of the United Kingdom, to be publicly Hanged as punishment of crimes against Humanity.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
